    • Method Detail

      • selectBeanForModule

        public static <T> Optional<T> selectBeanForModule(Class<T> type,
                                                  String moduleName,
                                                  org.springframework.beans.factory.config.ConfigurableListableBeanFactory beanFactory)
                                           throws org.springframework.beans.factory.NoUniqueBeanDefinitionException
        Utility method that will find the most appropriate bean of given type for a module. This method will try to find a bean annotated with the Module annotation with the provided moduleName as value.

        If no bean annotated with a Module annotation with moduleName as value was found, this method will default to a bean of the given type without a Module annotation.

        Parameters:
        type - The Class of the required type of the requested bean
        moduleName - The required value of the Module annotation for the requested bean
        beanFactory - The beanFactory which will be used to find the requested bean
        Returns:
        Optional filled with the requested bean if found
        Throws:
        org.springframework.beans.factory.NoUniqueBeanDefinitionException
